data.title: Applicant Inquiries
data.meta_description: IntelliCorp provides various information, forms and support necessary to protect job applicants and their personal information.
data.text:
How can the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) help me?

The CFPB is a U.S. Government agency responsible for consumer protection in the financial marketplace. The CFPB helps empower consumers to take more control over their economic lives.

To get free information on consumer topics including mortgages, credit cards, student loans, bank accounts, vehicle or consumer loans, credit reporting, money transfers, and other financial services call toll-free, 1-855-411-2372, or visit www.consumerfinance.gov. To file a complaint, contact the CFPB at 1-855-411-2372 or use the online complaint form.

If you feel you are a victim of identity theft, the CFPB has information to assist you available on their website: www.consumerfinance.gov/learnmore. In addition, the CFPB has published the following document that provides an overview of the identity theft issue: “Remedying the Effects of Identity Theft.”

How can I submit my expungement?

An expungement is a type of legal proceeding that involves an individual submitting a formal request to a judge asking to seal or destroy part or all of his/her criminal record so it cannot be viewed by the general public.

If you would like to send an expungement order signed by a judge to IntelliCorp, please contact IntelliCorp’s compliance unit.

Each jurisdiction has its own guidelines for determining what records can be expunged, or whether expungements are available at all. Additional information related to expungements can be obtained through the Expungement Clearinghouse or the Foundation for Continuing Justice.

Asistencia en Idiomas Extranjeros

IntelliCorp Records, Inc. no tiene una persona en el personal que habla español con fluidez. Sin embargo, le agradecemos la oportunidad de ayudarle con preguntas o problemas que pueda tener que relacionarse con su verificación de antecedentes, las nuevas investigaciones de controversias, o solicitar copia de la presentación.

A fin de proporcionar la ayuda que está buscando, por favor tenga a una persona que habla Inglés y Español en contacto con IntelliCorp en su nombre y estaremos encantados de transmitir la información necesaria a través de este designe. Usted puede comunicarse con la Unidad de Cumplimiento de IntelliCorp al 866-202-1436.
